item.title: Ideas
item.author: ren
item.description: Here are some ideas that I am interesred in. Dashboard of Everything A web app that helps you monitor any changing things. (e.g. crypto, stock, exchange) User can set what to monitor and set bottom or change alerts. tech to be used: PyCrawler + Flask College Rankings based on Faculty Generally, if college A is better than college B, then a PhD who graduated from A can be a faculty at B, but a PhD who graduated from B cannot be a faculty at A.

item.title: Hello
item.author: ren
item.description: Hello, world! This is the first post on my site. I will share my feelings and thoughts with you here.
